Package address

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
address.Menu
public class Menu extends Object
Menu class is used to display menu options to the user to modify an AddressBook.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final AddressBook
    addressBook
    The AddressBook modified by the menu's interface.
    private final AddressBookConnection
    connection
    A connection to a database.

    Creates a menu with an AddressBook.

  • Method Details

    • addEntry

      public void addEntry(AddressEntry entry)
      Adds an AddressEntry given by the user to the AddressBook.
      Parameters:
      entry - The AddressEntry to add to the AddressBook.

    • removeEntry

      public void removeEntry(AddressEntry entry)
      Removes an entry from the AddressBook chosen by the user based on the last name of the entry.
      Parameters:
      entry - The AddressEntry to remove from the AddressBook.

    • findEntries

      public Collection<AddressEntry> findEntries(String lastName)
      Finds and prints address entries matching the lastName from the AddressBook.
      Parameters:
      lastName - The last name to filter entries by.
      Returns:
      A Collection<AddressEntry> of address entries with entries that match the given last name.

    • getEntries

      public Collection<AddressEntry> getEntries()
      Returns a collection containing the entries in the AddressBook.
      Returns:
      a collection containing the entries in the AddressBook.

    • updateEntry

      public void updateEntry(AddressEntry entry, String firstName, String lastName, String street, String city, String state, int zip, String phone, String email)
      Updates the AddressEntry. If the entry was not already present in the AddressBook, it is added.
      Parameters:
      entry - The AddressEntry to update.
      firstName - The updated first name.
      lastName - The updated last name.
      street - The updated street.
      city - The updated city.
      state - The updated state.
      zip - The updated zip.
      phone - The updated phone.
      email - The updated email.

    • refreshAddressBook

      public void refreshAddressBook()
      Refreshes the AddressBook from the entries in the database.

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection()
      Closes the database connection.
